meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class MULAN

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MultilabelClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MULAN
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class MULAN
extends MultilabelClassifier
    MULAN.java - A wrapper for MULAN MULAN classifiers.
    The classifiers are instantiated here with suitable parameters.
    Author:
    Jesse Read (jmr30@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setMethod(java.lang.String m)
        Set a prescribed MULAN classifier configuration.
        Parameters:
        m - key; one of: BR, LP, CLR, RAkEL1, RAkEL2, MLkNN, IBLR_ML, BPMLL (you can add more in the MULAN.java code)
